mapper.select: SELECT EVENT_NO, EVENT_TITLE, TO_CHAR(EVENT_START_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') EVENT_START_DAY, TO_DATE(EVENT_END_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') EVENT_END_DAY, EVENT_LIMIT, EVENT_MEM_COUNT FROM GROUP_EVENT WHERE GROUP_NO = #{gno} AND (TO_CHAR(EVENT_START_DAY, 'YYYY-MM') = #{date} OR TO_CHAR(EVENT_END_DAY, 'YYYY-MM') = #{date})
